recruiting_advice: Our twitter: https://twitter.com/daylight Projects candidates could work on: • Build the Daylight API - a robust, scalable, and developer-friendly API that the biggest web3 apps and wallets will use • Engineer Daylight’s Cataloger backend, building a service that ingests abilities across many sources and serves up abilities via API

company.name: Daylight
company.description: Daylight tells you everything your wallet address can do: derivative mints, votes, airdrop claims, token-gated unlocks, and more. We call these things you can do “abilities”, and we believe they are the most fun experiences you can have in web3. Daylight delivers these meaningful experiences to all web3 users across our own app as well as the wallets and web apps that use our API.
company.teamAbout: We are backed by crypto-native investors and have been working together in crypto for the past four years. Our founder was Director of Product at a top thirty crypto network, and our lead engineer was his counterpart there as Director of Engineering.

name: Engineer [Fullstack Web3]
description: buildspace is looking for a builder to work on their web3 projects. They are partnered with many top protocols and companies in the industry.

requirements.description: A history of building products in public that have shipped to actual users
Ex-founder or worked at startups before

company.name: Buildspace
company.description:
We're building a new path for the world's best builders to come together, explore promising domains and ship meaningful products. We're backed by a16z and YC to build Hogwarts for builders and dreamers. 

Instead of feeding you fake visionary bullshit on the raise announcement -- let me just tell you wtf we’re building. We're building a school for people that don't want to just “get a job”.

It’s a place where you can figure out what you’re passionate about, create something you love working on, and then learn how to turn that creation into a financially sustainable path you can pursue full-time.
company.productDescription: The best started like the rest. Weekend builds are the perfect way to get your hands dirty and get building. Explore domains like web3, machine learning and artificial intelligence by building projects that just need a weekend.
company.teamAbout:
We’re a remote company that meets up irl multiple times a year to hack/work together. If you’re good at what you do and want to join us, then we don’t really care where you’re based. We’ll make it work. We do have a preference for people in the US since we usually meet up within the US, so traveling is easier. But, not required.

Ex-founders, people who have worked at startups in the past, people who have built + shipped their own personal projects/products to real users, and really anyone that’s made an honest effort to do cool shit in the real world.
We don’t care about FANNG experience, degrees, your age, or what college you attended. But, we do care deeply about your history building products that shipped to actual users.

name: Marketing Lead
description:
As our 1st marketing hire, you’ll be responsible for defining and executing our marketing strategy across all disciplines to drive top of the funnel interest for our product and ultimately the number of self-serve developers who use Paper to power their payments & accounts infrastructure. 

You’ll work across the entire user journey, from building systems that generate initial awareness about our products to driving organic referrals from happy customers. You’ll be creating and running paid and organic content experiments across multiple channels, and scaling the most effective ones that you find. You’ll also own the go to market strategy for our high-profile customer and product launches.

As a key member in our small and nimble team, you’ll work closely together with developer relations, product and sales to have a direct impact on all aspects of the business.

requirements.description: Are data-driven and have experience with SEO and programmatic ads
Have 5+ years of experience in marketing for a developer tool or SaaS company
Have scaled marketing functions at fast-growing start-ups or technology companies

workPlaceText: we're only considering candidates who can work on-site in SF or willing to relocate
visa_text_more: Only for existing H-1B in the US or are from NAFTA countries (Mexico/Canada)

company.name: Paper
company.description:
In the future where the real world blends with the virtual world, we believe that non-fungible tokens will form the asset layer that represents identity, membership & ownership.

Our mission is to make NFTs more accessible and useful. From credit card checkout for NFTs to wallet infrastructure, we’ve helped creators, developers and brands make NFTs accessible for their audience so they can focus on providing value and utility for owners. We believe our products will accelerate progress towards a better, more decentralized world.

When there are less boundaries created by centralized platforms, there are less fees taken by middle parties and more interoperability for the assets you purchase and earn. This means more collaboration between ecosystems and more economic freedom for all the participants who create value.
company.teamAbout:
Paper is a seed-stage startup with technical founders backed by world-class investors, and we’re looking for others who are passionate about Web 3.0 and startups.

We think it’s crucial for the early core team to collaborate in person and iterate quickly. We don’t currently have remote positions available.

At Paper, we’re looking for people aligned with our mission of improving accessibility in web3. You’re encouraged to apply even if you don’t fully match the job description. Your passion and willingness to learn quickly will suit you well in this nascent industry. We’re an equal opportunity employer and welcome diverse perspectives, and we’d love to hear from you!

name: Founding Frontend Engineer
description: As a frontend engineer at Axel, you’ll be building the user-facing features that are critical to customers’ success while also defining the internal standards and tooling that empower our own engineers with a great development experience.

requirements.description: Rigorous frontend framework experience
Computer Science or related degree

workPlaceText: we prefer candidates based in the US

company.name: Axel
company.description:
Axel builds developer infrastructure for the future of finance. We’re unlocking financial freedom for everyone, starting with the developer.

Axel is the leading universal and composable decentralized finance infrastructure platform. We’ve built the world class developer tooling needed to make building on the blockchain frictionless.

Axel is extremely well funded from phenomenal investors and some of the brightest minds in technology, giving us many years of runway and the ability to pay competitive salaries, offer great benefits, and provide meaningful equity.
company.teamAbout:
We’re a tight-knit crew of engineers, former founders, and blockchain aficionados. The Axel team comes from from leading companies and universities like Stanford, Coinbase, Alchemy, MIT, and Oracle. Our roadmap is full of big ideas and little details, and we would love your help bringing them to life.

Our culture is at the core of everything we do. We're obsessed with building teams that are intentional about what they create and empathetic through their process. We know that Axel is not possible without trailblazing, caring, and collaborative visionaries, so we've curated an environment that makes you excited to come to work each day and build a product we're all proud of — together.

name: Full Stack Engineer
description: As an early engineer at Paper, you’ll define the new standard for merchants to on-ramp and provide real benefits for NFTs to their audience. You’ll build developer-facing tools (SDKs, APIs, webapps) that are simple yet powerful to address the rapidly growing needs of our customers. As more brands and creators look towards NFTs to build a direct relationship to their fanbase, you’ll also build web3-friendly products for buyers (wallets, social features, integrating token-gating to other products) that truly focus on the utility that NFTs offer.

requirements.description: Experience in Javascript frameworks, Typescript, and NodeJS

workPlaceText: we're only considering candidates who can work on-site in SF or willing to relocate
visa_text_more: Only for existing H-1B in the US or are from NAFTA countries (Mexico/Canada)
experience_info: on a product-focused web application team

company.name: Paper
company.description:
In the future where the real world blends with the virtual world, we believe that non-fungible tokens will form the asset layer that represents identity, membership & ownership.

Our mission is to make NFTs more accessible and useful. From credit card checkout for NFTs to wallet infrastructure, we’ve helped creators, developers and brands make NFTs accessible for their audience so they can focus on providing value and utility for owners. We believe our products will accelerate progress towards a better, more decentralized world.

When there are less boundaries created by centralized platforms, there are less fees taken by middle parties and more interoperability for the assets you purchase and earn. This means more collaboration between ecosystems and more economic freedom for all the participants who create value.
company.teamAbout:
Paper is a seed-stage startup with technical founders backed by world-class investors, and we’re looking for others who are passionate about Web 3.0 and startups.

We think it’s crucial for the early core team to collaborate in person and iterate quickly. We don’t currently have remote positions available.

At Paper, we’re looking for people aligned with our mission of improving accessibility in web3. You’re encouraged to apply even if you don’t fully match the job description. Your passion and willingness to learn quickly will suit you well in this nascent industry. We’re an equal opportunity employer and welcome diverse perspectives, and we’d love to hear from you!

name: Solutions Engineer
description: We're looking for a web3 Solution Engineer specialist to help guide our high-touch clients from the beginning of their web3 journey through to successful launch of their projects

requirements.description: 1-2 years in crypto or NFTs
3+ years in an API-based SaaS or gaming company

workPlaceText: we're a remote first company but only within the US

company.name: thirdweb
company.description: We've built an intuitive platform which allows you to build and launch Web3 projects in a matter of clicks. Easily add features such as NFT drops, marketplaces, currencies, royalty splits and many more. Adding a feature deploys a smart contract into your wallet We then provide SDKs, widgets and admin interfaces to accelerate your project.
company.teamAbout:
We exist to accelerate Web3 by equipping the next generation of creators and entrepreneurs with the tools to build Web3 products, games and experiences.

We've built an intuitive platform which allows you to build and launch Web3 projects in a matter of clicks.

Our founders, Steven Bartlett and Furqan Rydhan have track records of building successful businesses which have experienced explosive growth and redefined industries. Who are you? 👩👨‍🦰

name: Founding Backend + API Engineer
description:
As a backend engineer at Axel, you will design and build platforms, APIs, and services that are configurable and scalable around the globe. You’ll dictate Axel’s roadmap and set the standard for clean, readable, and secure APIs backed by a comprehensive test suite. You will spearhead many functions at Axel, with the opportunity to both work on infrastructure/platform systems, as well as produce direct user-facing business impact. You'll be working with a sophisticated and high-throughput distributed system, where you'll focus on architecting clean, intuitive, scalable, and seamless APIs + abstractions for developers across the globe.

You do not need to have any blockchain, web3/crypto, or DeFi experience to work in this role at Axel — we uphold a culture of collaborative coaching and learning. If you come to Axel, you’ll become a 10x better builder. We ensure you’re fully equipped with the skill set you need to excel in this space.

requirements.description: Background in Computer Science or a technically related field
2-4 years in backend development experience
Experience designing, building, scaling, and maintaining developer-centric API products

workPlaceText: we prefer candidates based in the US

company.name: Axel
company.description:
Axel builds developer infrastructure for the future of finance. We’re unlocking financial freedom for everyone, starting with the developer.

Axel is the leading universal and composable decentralized finance infrastructure platform. We’ve built the world class developer tooling needed to make building on the blockchain frictionless.

Axel is extremely well funded from phenomenal investors and some of the brightest minds in technology, giving us many years of runway and the ability to pay competitive salaries, offer great benefits, and provide meaningful equity.
company.teamAbout:
We’re a tight-knit crew of engineers, former founders, and blockchain aficionados. The Axel team comes from from leading companies and universities like Stanford, Coinbase, Alchemy, MIT, and Oracle. Our roadmap is full of big ideas and little details, and we would love your help bringing them to life.

Our culture is at the core of everything we do. We're obsessed with building teams that are intentional about what they create and empathetic through their process. We know that Axel is not possible without trailblazing, caring, and collaborative visionaries, so we've curated an environment that makes you excited to come to work each day and build a product we're all proud of — together.

name: Lead Product Designer
description: We're looking for a creative Product Designer who loves Product, is excited about pushing boundaries and collaborates smoothly with engineers on Figma.

requirements.description: A passion for interviewing users and extracting their problems into insights
Figma expertise
At least 4 years of experience designing consumer, social, mobile, creator economy-related products. Web3 experience is optional
Collaborating with engineers

workPlaceText: Prefer US talent but open to international if they are exceptional
visa_text: Visa sponsorship available to exceptional candidates
visa_text_more: We highly prefer US candidates but are open to international if they are exceptional

company.name: Showtime
company.description: Our mission is to onboard billions to crypto by building something that feels familiar to what people use everyday. We are building a social network, one eventually owned and governed by users, that powers our social interactions online. Our first product is a platform to discover and showcase any kind of visual NFT, starting with crypto art. Beyond NFT, our goal is to introduce new crypto primitives that will make a better social media experience for both creators and their communities.
company.teamAbout: We are a group of hard-working, ambitious people passionate about how tech moves the world forward. As wildcards ourselves, we welcome people who don't fit into traditional norms: underrepresented minorities, college dropouts, outliers... if you're exceptionally talented, energetic and passionate, we would love to work with you. Together, we are creating a new paradigm, so you don't need a normal CV to apply! Our culture is proactive: on your defined scope, you will have a lot of freedom. And since we are a very young startup, your scope of work will be relatively large.

name: Senior Backend Engineer (Go)
description:
This role will have the primary accountability of designing, implementing, and operating Syndica’s blockchain infrastructure platform. Golang knowledge is a necessity! The team operates with a “run what you write” philosophy and each engineer is responsible for deploying and operating the code they write.

A successful candidate must have demonstrable experience in at least one programming language (preferably Go, Rust or C++), and previous work in SaaS application development and operations. You will be responsible to ensure the environment is built, deployed, configured, managed, and monitored correctly to support the business. The ideal candidate will also have prior experience developing applications on either of the three major cloud platforms - AWS, Azure, or GCP via Kubernetes.

requirements.description: Prioritizing candidates in the US
3+ years related professional experience using Golang
Experience with automation tools/platforms

workPlaceText: prefer US talent but open to international talent if candidate is exceptional

company.name: Syndica
company.description:
Syndica is a developer infrastructure company building the cloud of web3. We are dedicated to building developer infrastructure that just works. Syndica offers highly scalable RPC node infrastructure, with advanced logging and analytics.

We are backed by strategic partners, investors, and advisors who are all-in on our mission: Chamath of Social Capital, Solana Ventures, and many more.
company.teamAbout:
Our team is composed of the brightest crypto-native minds from places like Messari and 0x Labs as well as traditional technology firms like Facebook, AWS, Microsoft, and more.

At Syndica, big things happen. Every day, we’re translating vision into reality by tackling new and exciting challenges head-on. This is a breakthrough stage in our company, and you’ll experience firsthand the infectious enthusiasm of our employees and leadership team. You’ll have the opportunity to learn new skills, grow your career, and work with the smartest, most passionate people in crypto.

name: Full Stack Engineer (Frontend Leaning)
description:
You will be in charge of designing and implementing new Zeet features, across the Tech Stack. You will work closely with our CTO and other engineers on the team and have the opportunity to make huge impact.

A typical week can include implementing new APIs, designing new database schema, and crafting a corresponding frontend flow.

requirements.description: More frontend leading with experience using frameworks like React & Typescript
Has experience building GraphQL or REST based microservices with Golang
Previous startup experience
Minimum 2 years relevant full stack engineering experience

workPlaceText: we are open to remote talent but only within US and can support H1B transfer if needed

company.name: Zeet.co
company.description: We’re building a platform for software engineers to build on the cloud faster, better, and more scalably than ever before. Our mission is to accelerate the adoption of cloud compute and unlock production-grade deployments for every developer. The next generation of startups will be built using multiple cloud technologies, from standard cloud providers like AWS and GCP to up-and-coming decentralized solutions like IPFS. The future is going to be far more complex, and we need tooling to manage it. Zeet will be the interface to the cloud(s) upon which the next generation of companies is built.
company.productDescription: Zeet is the best place to deploy any software into your AWS account, then [ SCALE ] to millions of users without breaking a sweat.
company.teamAbout: We're a small venture-backed team of driven technical builders, who have been working together for years building scalable infrastructure across companies like Amazon, Bebo, and Embark. We've set up production infrastructure countless times, and we know how annoying it is.

name: Engineering Manager
description: Zerion is looking for an experienced and driven Engineering Manager to help grow and solidify their engineering team. The role will focus on people and engineering process so that they can continue shipping best in class Web3 applications.

requirements.description: Technical knowledge to discuss issues, approaches, and solutions in depth
2+ years of Engineering Management experience
4+ years in Software Engineering

workPlaceText: hiring only EU based candidates!

company.name: Zerion
company.description: Zerion is a web3 smart, social wallet and investing tool that enables anyone with a mobile phone or computer to explore every corner of web3 from DeFi to NFTs - all in one place.
company.teamAbout: We are a group of crypto-software-finance nerds with ideas on how to bend the world around us. We challenge each other daily, we are extremely transparent and honest. We think that being passionate is better than being mistaken. If you find yourself in the description above, join us!

name: Backend Engineer
description:
As a Platform Engineer at Zeet, you will integrate advanced cloud functionality into the Zeet Platform, and help bring production-grade operational efficiency to developers everywhere. You will work closely with our CTO and other engineers, bridging the gap between cloud infrastructure and application development.

Platform Engineering at Zeet concerns itself primarily with cloud infrastructure tools like Terraform, Kubernetes, Helm, and the various Cloud APIs. However, this is not an SRE or DevOps role. You will write code, not configuration, automating these tools to bring the best of their functionality to teams everywhere.

requirements.description: Is deeply familiar with DevOps best practices across a variety of orgs
Has experience with modern cloud environment like AWS, GCP, and others
At least 3+ years professional experience in backend/platform engineering
Has a software engineering mindset - they write code, not configuration, and think about systems first
